mapper.insert: insert into MATEREVIEW(RNO, REVIEWCOMMENT, REVIEWGRADE, RDATE, MEMBERNO, MCOMMUNITYNO) VALUES (MATECOMMUNITY_SEQ.nextval, #{reviewComment}, #{reviewGrade}, sysdate, #{memberNo}, #{mCommunityNo})
mapper.select: select mr.RNO, mr.REVIEWCOMMENT, mr.REVIEWGRADE, mr.RDATE, m.MEMBERNO, mr.MCOMMUNITYNO, m.NAME from MATEREVIEW mr, MEMBER m where mr.RNO = #{rNo} and m.MEMBERNO = mr.MEMBERNO
